header.description: Plugin for sending notifications to Slack.

step-type.description: Send a notification to a Slack channel.

property-ui.description: The Incoming WebHook URL that will accept external messages into Slack.

property-ui.description: Your public channel within Slack where UrbanCode Deploy messages will be sent. The WebHook must have access to this channel.
property-ui.label: Channel

property-ui.description: An optional value that can either be one of good, warning, danger, or any hex color code (eg. #439FE0).
property-ui.label: Colour

property-ui.description: The list of emoji supported are taken from https://github.com/iamcal/emoji-data .
property-ui.label: Emoji Icon

property-ui.description: The environment where the application has been deployed.
property-ui.label: Environment

property-ui.description: The name of the component deployed.
property-ui.label: Component Name

property-ui.description: The version of the component deployed.
property-ui.label: Version

step-type.name: Post Notification to Slack using OAuth Token
step-type.description: Send a notification to a Slack channel using OAuth Token.

property-ui.description: Channel to send message to. Can be an encoded ID, or a name.
property-ui.label: Channel

property-ui.description: Text of the message to send.
property-ui.label: Message

step-type.description: Send a notification to a Slack channel.

property-ui.label: Incoming WebHook

property-ui.description: A custom name overriding the default defined in the webhook configuration
property-ui.label: Username
